channel.title: Losing items on death?

item.title: Losing items on death?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Well, how does your source handle item dropping on death when it’s via PvP? I’d assume it’s associated with the isSkulled boolean considering there’s no visible dropItems-type method or anything else along those lines.

Read full topic

item.title: Losing items on death?
item.dc:creator: @FromAutumnToAshes FromAutumnToAshes
item.description:
@FromAutumnToAshes wrote:

Hey guys, I ran into a problem while coding my RSPS- When people are pked or killed by npc, they don’t lose any of their items. This is my DeathStage 2 code…

[code] AtkPray = 0;
StrPrayer = 0;
DefPray = 0;
RangePray = 0;
MagePray = 0;
PrayHeal = true;
ProtItem = false;
ProtMage = false;
ProtRange = false;
ProtMelee = false;
Redemption = false;
Retribution = false;
Smite = false;
Chivalry = false;
Piety = false;
isSkulled = false;
lastSkull = 0;
headIcon = 0;
turnpray();
heightLevel = 0;
currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
deathStage = 0;
resetAnimation();
frame1();
skulls = 0;
skulltimer = 0;
frame61(0);
isSkulled = false;
prayOn = false;
freezeTimer = 0;
followingh = false;

		sM("Oh dear! You have died.");
        		resetOtherAtk();[/code]

Can someone tell me what to add to make them lose their items and to be dropped on the ground? Thanks!

Read full topic
